file

Class FileUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • file.FileUtility

  • public abstract class FileUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to do action on the file (count lines, split file into three subfiles, ...)
    Author:
    Nicolas Devenet

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Get the path to the folder where the application is executed

      Extension for the output file
      static java.lang.String extension_tmp
      Extension for temporary text files
      static java.lang.String separator
      Get the line separator by default
      static java.lang.String tmp
      Path to the temporary directory

    • Method Detail

      • split

        public static java.lang.String split(java.lang.String filePath,
                     int begin,
                     int end)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Split a file into 3 subfiles (1: not crypted, 2: to be crypted, 3: not crypted)
        Parameters:
        filePath - String path to the file to be splitted
        begin - begin line to split the file
        end - end line to split the file
        Returns:
        String prefix of the temporary subfiles
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • unaggregate

        public static java.lang.String unaggregate(java.lang.String filePath,
                           int marker)
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        Split the file into two not crypted file. Action done in order to recompose the entire file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - String path to the file to be unaggregated
        marker - line where the file whould be splitted
        Returns:
        String prefix of the temporary files
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • aggregate

        public static void aggregate(java.lang.String prefix,
             java.lang.String output)
                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                             java.io.IOException
        Aggregate file from the two uncrypted parts. Generate a single file, and add at the end marker (to know where split the file).
        Parameters:
        prefix - String prefix of the temporary subfiles
        output - String path of the output file wich will be created
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • recompose

        public static void recompose(java.lang.String prefix,
             java.lang.String output)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Recompose file from the three parts of itself. Need the two not crypted parts, and the part just decrypted. Generate a single file, totaly decrypted.
        Parameters:
        prefix - String prefix of the temporary files
        output - String path to the output file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • display

        public static java.lang.String display(java.lang.String filePath)
                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        Method to read and display a text file. Return a String with the content of the readed file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - String path to the text file you want to read
        Returns:
        String content of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • lines

        public static int lines(java.lang.String filePath)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Return the number of lines in a file. (If 0 is returned, it's mean that the file countain only one blank line)
        Parameters:
        filePath - path to the file to count lines
        Returns:
        number of lines in the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • last

        public static java.lang.String last(java.lang.String filePath)
        Get the last line of a file. Return null is an error occured.
        Parameters:
        filePath - name of the file
        Returns:
        String content of the last line of the file

      • clean

        public static void clean()
        Remove temporary files and folder tmp.
